Content: Pro traders arent any better at predicting where the market will go than a hobby trader and its not the job. The difference is all in execution Finding lvls protecting profits once available stopping out  adjusting when wrong and consistant loss size control. Focus there

Closing update #ES_F Note newsletter was sent out about an hour ago detailing entriessetups for earnings today then tomorrow. 5585 to 5654 remains the range and bulls will need to keep defending 5585 to fill this back out. tradecompanion.substack.com

Classic failed breakdown in #ES_F. As posted nonstop we are in a range from 5654 to 5588. 5630 fail triggered to range support we flushed last Thursdays low recovered squeezed. Size down ahead of Nvidia  5615 hit 5630 5654 next if bulls want. 5585 fails sell 5572 5550

Its been a nice range round trip in #ES_F as we ping pong the 5654 to 558890 range since last Monday now. Nvidia should break it. 5630 fail triggered down to range support 5605 5590. Probing below now  5605 recovery triggers failed breakdown up the range. 5575 554750 below

And theres the full range round trip in #ES_F. 5654 to 5588 has been the range since last Monday. 5630 fail targeted 5605 as posted where we spent 3 hours before making the recent dip.  Bulls must recover 5605 now to resume higher. 5575 554550 are next down if we continue.

Market #ES_F continues to fill out the 56545590 multiday range as we await Nvidia. 5630 remains the key midpivot  its failure targeted 5605 as posted. Precision here as Weve been at 5605 since 11am  No change 5616 must reclaim to resume up. 559093 is must hold support below

The 56545590 multi day range is filling out in as we await Nvidia. 5630 has been the midpivot flushing  reclaiming 19x. As posted 5605 was support below  #ES_F agrees defending for 1hr.  Bulls must react fast. 5616 recover takes us back up. Below here is 559093 must hold

We continue to fill out the 5654 to 5590 range in #ES_F with 5630 mid pivot. We are now on the 19th probe below 5630 since last Mon. As posted 5615 5605 were next down  just hit 5605  Below there we test 5590 range support. Must hold. 5616 must recover to revisit 5630 again

We are back no surprise to the 562530 magnet for test #19 since last Monday. This has failedrecovered 19x. We are ultimately just coiling for Nvidia all noise until then in #ES_F. 56545588chop range  No change 5630 must recover to resume up. 5615 5605 next down from here

Markets #ES_F are as coiled as can be now. Since last Monday weve been flagging waiting on Nvidia now 56545588. 5630 had been the midpivot trapping and recovering below 18x perhaps a 19th incoming  Nothing to do but wait. 5646 5654 breakout 5672 when ready. Dip5625

All noise until Nvidia earnings for #ES_F. We are coiled tight  as warned for 4 days 56545588the range with 5630 being the trap zonemagnet. Its lost trapped shorts reclaimed 18x since last Monday 18 profitable longs  Dont overtrade. 5646 5654 5672 live. Dip562530

Since last Monday 5630 has been the ATM Machine as posted in #ES_F. We have testedflushedreclaimed 18x each being profitable. We did it again overnight  Plan Coiled for Nvidia. 5654 to 562530chop. As long as 2530 holds 5646 5654 break 5672 live. 25 fails dip 5605

Closing update Another day of consolidation as we setup a trend leg. 5630 remains the ATM machine and weve lost and recovered now 17x each which was a viable trade. 5654 breakout 5677 when #ES_F ready. Newsletter out soon talking triggers tomorrow tradecompanion.substack.com

5630 continues to be an ATM Machine. As posted its the key pivotmagnet and weve now flushed  reclaimed 17x in the last week. Just did again. 5640 5654 were targets as posted creeping to 5654. Trend leg is close  Breakout to 5663 5677 when #ES_F ready. 5630 5619supports

Nice pop to 5640 target and again it should be no shock where we still are 5630. As warned nonstop 5630 is the consolidation magnet  consolidations repetitively flush and reclaim magnets its been 17x now for 5630.  55885654chop range #ES_F waiting on a breakout catalyst
I wrote further on the principles for trading these in last nights newsletter

Traders getting a masterclass in how consolidation trading works. Consolidations precede huge trend legs. They feature a pivot 5630 that traps recovers countless times then breakout.55885654the range  5640 was 1st target hit 5654 5677 if #ES_F wants. Same supports

Good follow through  5640 hit. Yet another trap  recovery of 5630 played out for #16 in the past week. This is how consolidations work they have a pivot. They trap recover trap recover. Then break out  Lock in partials here. 5654 next if ES wants then 5677. Same supports

It should come as no surprise where we are again 5630. As warned nonstop this is the range magnet. In the last week we have flushed it and returned hererecovered 16x now. Its key not to overtradechase in this trade the traps.  5640 5654 if ES can push. 5604 is below 5619

We continue to fill out the chop range in #ES_F and 5588 to 5654 remains the range with a 5630 midpivot. As posted do not overtrade in this you will lose money. In the last week we have tested below 5630 15x  again now  No change. 5619support. 5630 must reclaim to resume up
